formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Usage: DATABASE GET <family> <key> Retrieves an entry in the Asterisk database for a given family and key. Returns 0 if <key> is not set. Returns 1 if <key> is set and returns the variable in parentheses. Example return code: 200 result=1 (testvariable)

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen: --- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,3 +4,4 @@ Returns 0 if <key> is not set. Returns 1 if <key> is set and returns the variable in parentheses. Example return code: 200 result=1 (testvariable) + Runs Dead : Yes
